'''Andrew Wilde''' is an actor who was mostly active in the 1980s and 1990s, appearing in films such as [[wikipedia:Nineteen Eighty-Four (film)|''Nineteen Eighty-Four'']] and [[wikipedia:The Bounty|''The Bounty'']]. His last TV credit was a role on television drama ''[[wikipedia:A Touch of Frost|A Touch of Frost]]'' in 1996.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Tobho Mott]] and was confirmed in the role on 24 November 2010. He initially appeared as a guest star in the [[Season 1|first season]] and returned in this role for the [[Season 2|second season]].
